name: visiobot-monorepo
description: Monorepo for VISIOBOT Discord bot, web UI, mobile app, and standout features
author: TELEXLLC

scripts.lint:web: npm --workspace web run lint || echo 'No lint script in web/'
scripts.start:mobile: npm --workspace mobile run start || echo 'No mobile workspace yet'
scripts.build:mobile: npm --workspace mobile run build || echo 'No mobile workspace yet'
scripts.test: echo 'Add monorepo-wide tests or use workspace-specific tests.'
scripts.cool:theme: echo 'Theme toggling is handled in web/theme-toggle.js'
scripts.cool:status: echo 'Bot status dashboard runs in web/'
scripts.help: echo 'Available scripts: start:web, dev:web, build:web, lint:web, start:mobile, build:mobile, start:discord, cool:qr, cool:theme, cool:status'
